mapper.select: select p.*, sp.schedule_start, sp.schedule_end, tp.together_start, tp.together_end, m.map_place, mb.member_nick , mpi.attachment_no from post p full outer join schedule_post sp on p.post_no = sp.post_no Left outer join together_post tp on p.post_no = tp.post_no Left outer join map m on p.post_no = m.post_no Left OUTER JOIN member mb ON p.member_id = mb.member_id Left OUTER JOIN member_profile_image mpi ON p.member_id = mpi.member_id where p.post_no = #{postNo}
